titleStmt.title: Remerciement fait au Roi de la part de l'eglise francoise et de l'eglise flamande de la ville de Londres pour les graces que sa Majesté a accordées aux estrangers protestans qui se retirent dans son Roiaume prononcé par David Primerose, ministre de l'eglise francoise, le 19 October, 1681 = The thanks given to the King on the behalf of the French and Dutch churches in the city of London for the favours granted by His Majesty to the Protestant strangers retired into his kingdom / spoken the 19th of October, 1681, by David Primerose, minister of the French church in London.
titleStmt.author: Primerose, David.

titleStmt.title: Remerciement fait au Roi de la part de l'eglise francoise et de l'eglise flamande de la ville de Londres pour les graces que sa Majesté a accordées aux estrangers protestans qui se retirent dans son Roiaume prononcé par David Primerose, ministre de l'eglise francoise, le 19 October, 1681 = The thanks given to the King on the behalf of the French and Dutch churches in the city of London for the favours granted by His Majesty to the Protestant strangers retired into his kingdom / spoken the 19th of October, 1681, by David Primerose, minister of the French church in London.
titleStmt.author: Primerose, David.

notesStmt.note: Text in French and English in parallel columns.
"Imprimé par le commandement de sa Majesté = Printed by his Majesties command."
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery, San Marino, California (848:4).
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library, Chicago, Illinois (2270:13).
